Methods in org.apache.xml.serializer that return LSSerializerFilter

Methods in org.w3c.dom.ls that return LSSerializerFilter
 LSSerializerFilter LSSerializer.getFilter()
          When the application provides a filter, the serializer will call out to the filter before serializing each Node.
